column1: prompt
Compose a tweet that encourages young people to get out and vote.
Describe the five senses in a forest setting.
Calculate the surface area of a cylindrical tank with radius 9 cm and a height of 8 cm.
Identify a stylistic device used by the author in the following sentence. The cold breeze chills my bones.
Identify which type of paragraph this is: descriptive, expository, persuasive, or narrative. The sun was blazing in the sky and the smell of freshly cut grass wafted through the air.
Create a metaphor to compare an event to A roller coaster ride
Outline a strategy for starting a small business.

Generate a valid HTML code to create a two column table
Write a Java program which finds the maximum number from a given array

Find the fourth element of the following array [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]
Develop a creative way to stop smoking
Generate a tweet about fashion trends for the summer.
Who visited London this summer?
Given a history timeline, find and explain the most significant event within a decade. Timeline spanning from 1900 to 2000
Create a short story about a person exploring the jungle.
Describe what you see in this photo. <Photo Attached>
Name a few scientific theories.

Given a paragraph, summarize it in three sentences. The year 2020 has been an incredibly difficult one for many people around the world. With an unprecedented global pandemic upending daily life, people have had to adapt to a new normal. Businesses, schools, and even the way we interact with family and friends have all changed.

Compare and contrast the strengths and weaknesses of wind and solar energy.

"A species of mammal is one that has warm blood and gives birth to live young" A species of mammal is one that has warm blood and gives birth to live young

The car needs to be washed.
